name: Hyper Spin Arena
description:
A game made for the game maker 2 beta game jam.

A simple game where you have to stay inside the big circle, outside the small circle and smash opponents outside the boundary. Press any key to turn on your engine to prevent yourself from being pulled into the middle but to much power and you will go flying away. Beat the high score.

Controls

- arrow keys and enter or mouse to select menu options

- escape to exit

- any button to use you engine


Source code in downloadable
